title: Brave NUKES Privacy Feature! Should You Panic?
description:
Brave Browser is sunsetting its strict fingerprint protection. Here's their reasoning, the pros/cons, the alternatives for those needing strong fingerprint protection, my thoughts, and more!

More info on Brave thread: https://discuss.techlore.tech/t/brave-browser-simplifies-its-fingerprinting-protections-brave/6809
